title.rendered: Condolence Message to the People of Ghana

content.rendered:
Accra, GHANA – The Embassy of the United States of America offers heartfelt condolences in the wake of the deadly accident on the Kintampo-Tamale highway.

Our thoughts and prayers are with the victims and the families who have lost loved ones.

excerpt.rendered: Accra, GHANA – The Embassy of the United States of America offers heartfelt condolences in the wake of the deadly accident on the Kintampo-Tamale highway. Our thoughts and prayers are with the victims and the families who have lost loved ones.
